name: The Mini Foldies Bundle
description:
Foldie zines are fun to make! Fun to trade! Fun to leave in random places! 

Some of these zines won't make much sense as a file on your computer. Print them out for a RL puzzle game experience! Please note: some of these are meant to be printed double-sided. While you may enjoy both sheets of paper, they may not fold together as crisp as a single double-sided print!
